definition: Jon Huntsman, Jr. (1960-) Governor of Utah from 2005 to 2009, US Ambassador to China since August 2009
flood/big/great
surname Hong
extensive/ample/rich/obtain/aim/to win/to get/plentiful/to gamble
to bank up with earth/to cultivate (lit. or fig.)/to train (people)

sentences.english: But Mr Huntsman was apt to do some straight-talking of his own.
sentences.chinese: 但是洪博培更適應直來直去的方式。

sentences.english: Former governor of Utah, Jon Huntsman, is running for president.
sentences.chinese: 前猶他州長洪博培宣佈競選總統。

sentences.english: Huntsman, 50-year-old born in wealthy homes, the father is a businessman.
sentences.chinese: 現年50歲的洪博培出生鉅富之家，父親是生意人。

sentences.english: He was chosen by President Obama for the ambassador post and was confirmed by the Senate in August.
sentences.chinese: 洪博培是由奧巴馬任命的，議會在八月份批准該任命。

sentences.english: Ambassador and Mrs. Huntsman pause to view a yak butter candle at Ganden Monastery.
sentences.chinese: 洪博培大使及夫人在甘丹寺內駐足觀看犛牛酥油蠟燭。

sentences.english: Huntsman's ambassadorship does not end until midnight Saturday, known as 'the witching hour' to Team Huntsman.
sentences.chinese: 洪博培的候備競選團把這個時間稱爲“魔力時刻”。

sentences.english: One of them, Jon Huntsman, quipped that he mistook it for the price of a pizza.
sentences.chinese: 洪博培諷刺說他還以爲這是披薩的價格。

sentences.english: Ambassador and Mrs. Huntsman at the Potala Palace.
sentences.chinese: 洪博培大使及夫人在布達拉宮。

sentences.english: Huntsman said that U.S.-China relations enjoy a sound momentum of development.
sentences.chinese: 洪博培說，美中關係的發展勢頭很好。

sentences.english: Election experts say, Romney and Huntsman are Mormon.
sentences.chinese: 選情專家說，羅姆尼與洪博培都是摩門教徒。

sentences.english: Huntsman walked away from the scene after that comment.
sentences.chinese: 洪博培在聽到上述內容後立刻離開。

Vladimir Putin (1952-), president of Russia
Medvedyev (name)/Dmitry Anatolyevich Medvedev (1965-), Russian lawyer and politician, president of Russian Federation from 2008
